statements: DELETE FROM credit_score_changes WHERE customer_id = 100 AND credit_score < 600;
DELETE FROM credit_score_changes WHERE customer_id = 100 AND credit_score < 600;
DELETE FROM credit_score_changes WHERE reason = 'Fraudulent Activity' AND change_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM credit_scores WHERE score < 500 AND user_id = 'f71d9092-b4ed-4r28-8e0a-3395ece2b353';
DELETE FROM score_improvements WHERE improvement_date > '2022-01-01' AND user_id = '6f005ddb-fcda-4933-8ac4-7e54928cfb08';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND email = 'example@example.com';
